Key Match Events: West Indies survived a late scare to beat India by two wickets with seven balls remaining in their second Twenty20 cricket international.
The victory gives West Indies a 2-0 lead in the five-match contest.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The teams will stay in Providence, Guyana, for the third T20 on Tuesday, with the final two matches set for Lauderhill, Florida, on Aug. 12 and 13.
